long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost your social sales in Facebook Inbox with LiveShop!

》Chat Biz Tool
Most efficient order creation tool you’ve ever seen. Collect customers information and create orders within Facebook Inbox while you chat. Reach out to your potential buyers and directly create orders in Facebook Inbox.

》Before Install
Please make sure you have logged in LiveShop with your Facebook account. Hit HERE to create your account.

》After Install
Check the top right corner of Chrome to find LiveShop icon. Yes, the blue shark, you got it! Click on it to choose a Facebook Page you would like to sell you product.

Next step, choose a conversation, look for the LiveShop icon right next to the text input bar. When you find the little blue shark, click on it to start create order!
